item.title: CPR Jukebox Marathon 2022
item.dc:creator: Sarita Rajpoot
item.description:
Over the course of four hours, students will come together for our annual CPR Jukebox Marathon and complete 275,000 continuous compressions to provide awareness, have some fun, protect hearts and save lives. Enjoy tunes from our very own iHeart Radio DJ Ernesto from Q102, FREE Lunch, Dancing, Performances, Games, and even earn Community Service Hours! […]

The post CPR Jukebox Marathon 2022 appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Over the course of four hours, students will come together for our annual CPR Jukebox Marathon and complete 275,000 continuous compressions to provide awareness, have some fun, protect hearts and save lives. Enjoy tunes from our very own iHeart Radio DJ Ernesto from Q102, FREE Lunch, Dancing, Performances, Games, and even earn Community Service Hours!

Who: High School Students are invited from every school in Eastern Pennsylvania to perform CPR in 10 minute increments.
All students welcome any time between 12 – 4 PM to get in 10 minutes of compressions. You do not need to know CPR to join the marathon!

Why: Sudden Cardiac Arrest is the number one cause of death in student athletes. Saving lives is serious; learning how can be fun.

REGISTER | DONATE

Interested in sponsoring the event? Contact jenn@simonsheart.org

The post CPR Jukebox Marathon 2022 appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: CPR Jukebox Tour for SCA Awareness Month
item.dc:creator: Sarita Rajpoot
item.description:
Simon’s Heart CPR Jukebox will be hitting the road during the month of October in honor of Sudden Cardiac Arrest Awareness Month and what would have been Simon’s 17th birthday. Join us along the way and learn how to save a life! October 3rd: Philadelphia Eagles v. Kansas City Chiefs | Lincoln Financial Field Join […]

The post CPR Jukebox Tour for SCA Awareness Month appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Simon’s Heart CPR Jukebox will be hitting the road during the month of October in honor of Sudden Cardiac Arrest Awareness Month and what would have been Simon’s 17th birthday. Join us along the way and learn how to save a life!

October 3rd: Philadelphia Eagles v. Kansas City Chiefs | Lincoln Financial Field
Join us inside the stadium on the main concourse before kickoff at 1pm!

October 16th: Bill Lapp Tournament hosted by the Colonial Soccer Club
Location: 201 E. Germantown Pike, Colonial Drive, Lafayette Hill, PA
Time: 11am – 3pm

October 17th: Bee Someone’s Hero at Cannstatter
Location: 9130 Academy Rd, Philadelphia, PA
Time: 1pm – 5pm

October 24th: Angel in the Outfield Tournament in Memory of Jayden Rodriguez
Location: 145 Hancock Road, North Wales, PA
Time: 1pm – 4pm

October 30th: Esperanza Health Fair at Esperanza College
Location: 4261 N. 5th Street, Philadelphia, PA
Time: 11am – 2pm

October 31st: Philadelphia Union v. Cincinnati | Subaru Park
Join us for some Halloween fun and CPR outside of the park before kickoff at 7:30pm

The post CPR Jukebox Tour for SCA Awareness Month appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
